column1: #LOAD
LOADING_TIP_0;The Emperor is the Son of Heaven! Perfect and beyond reproach.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_1;The peach trees in the orchard are in full flower. Tomorrow we three will swear brotherhood and join together our goals and fates. -Zhang Fei
column2: Guan Yu

column1: LOADING_TIP_2;Though born from different families
column2: they swore to defend Heaven
column4: and Earth. And to fight and die on the very same day

column1: LOADING_TIP_3;They are many and we but few. We must beat them with superior strategy. - Liu Bei;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_4;I would rather betray the whole world than have the whole world betray me. - Cao Cao;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_5;Never do an evil act just because it is trivial. Never leave a good act undone just because it is small. - Liu Bei;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_6;The clever bird chooses a strong branch to perch on. The wise servant selects a strong master to serve. Seize the chance now
column2: for regret comes too late. - Li Su persuading Lu Bu to join Dong Zhuo;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_7;You will take every opportunity to force them asunder and thus cause the son to kill his adopted father and put an end to a great evil. - Wang Yun to Diao Chan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_8;When one is born great
column2: one cannot be patient for long under another person's domination. - Lu Bu before striking Dong Zhuo;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_9;I shall be allowed to set off and rejoin First Brother as soon as I hear where he is. Whether It be far or near. - Guan Yu's surrendering to Cao Cao;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_10;Truth and illusion are often disguised as each other
column2: Cao Cao likes to play this game
column3: both with friends and foes. - Liu Bei;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_11;He has the talent to measure the heavens and mete the earth. He is a man who overshadows every other in the world. - Xu Shu about Zhuge Liang;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_12;Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered. Those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. Thus
column2: the wise win before they fight
column3: and the ignorant fight to win. - Zhuge Liang;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_13;The world can do without Cao Hong
column2: but not without Cao Cao! - Cao Hong giving his horse to Cao Cao during an escape;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_14;He who wins people
column2: prospers. He who loses them
column3: fails. Your present plan should be to seek men of high aims and farseeing views
column4: only then can you establish yourself firmly.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_15;We thank you for the arrows Prime Minister. - Zhuge Liang to Cao Cao;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_16;What rises must fall. He who shows his hand is defeated. He who prevails by taking advantage of his enemy's doubts is invincible. - Cao Cao;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_17;Don’t fight with Liu Bei now! We are at war with Cao Cao. Victory or defeat is yet undecided. - Lu Su to Zhou Yu;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_18;I cannot help being angry thinking that we have used our resources for their benefit. They get all the advantage. - Zhou Yu to Lu Su;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_19;O heaven
column2: since thou made Lingming
column3: why did thou also create Kongming? - Zhou Yu (Lingming);;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_20;Do the unexpected. Attack the unprepared. - Zhuge Liang;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_21;In 215
column2: China’s land was divided into three kingdoms: Liu Bei of Shu to the West
column3: Cao Cao of Wei to the North
column4: and Sun Quan of Wu to the South. - Luo Guanzhong;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_22;The only heroes in the world are you and I. - Cao Cao to Liu Bei;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_23;Should he have doubts upon internal affairs
column2: he must turn to Zhang Zhao. And for external matters he must consult Zhou Yu. - Sun Ce advising Sun Quan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_24;If you could find either Sleeping Dragon or Young Phoenix
column2: you could restore order in the world. - Sima Hui to Liu Bei;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_25;To preserve a babe I very nearly lost a great commander! - Liu Bei to Zhao Yun after Changban;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_26;Human proposes and God disposes. We cannot wrest events to our will. - Zhuge Liang after failing to kill Sima Yi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_27;What a pity it is that of ten affairs in the world
column2: one always meets with eight or nine vexations. - Yang Hu to Sima Yan who refused to invade Wu;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_28;I believe man can prevail over destiny. - Zhao Yun;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_29;I know a little about strategy. - Zhuge Liang;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_30;Essence of my father
column2: blood of my mother
column3: I cannot throw this away! - Xiahou Dun eating his eye;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_31;I am He Man
column2: the devil who shoots across the sky. Who dares fight with me?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_32;The country long divided
column2: must unite. Long united

column1: LOADING_TIP_33;Brothers are akin to limbs
column2: wives are akin to clothing. Torn clothing can be mended
column3: but can severed limbs be reattached? - Liu Bei;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_34;What appears fake may be real
column2: what appears real may be fake. - Cao Cao before being ambushed by Guan Yu at the Huarong Trail;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_35;Attack if you can attack
column2: defend if you can't attack
column5: die if you can't surrender! - Sima Yi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_36;It is fun here
column2: I do not miss Shu. - Liu Shan to Cao Pi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_37;Cao Cao is very cunning. We must not fall into his ambush. - Lu Bu before being ambushed by Cao Cao;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_38;A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. - Laozi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_39;All Men Are Brothers. - Luo Guanzhong;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_40;The path that can be walked is not always the right path. The name that can be named is not always the right name. - Laozi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_41;Piercing wind
column2: freezing river of Yi. The hero fords
column3: and he never returns! - On Jing Ke's failed assassination of Qin Shi Huang;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_42;To have friends come from afar is happiness. - Confucius;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_43;If I had either Yan Liang or Wen Chou here
column2: I would have nothing to fear. - Yuan Shao;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_44;To learn and to practise what is learned time and again is pleasure
column2: is it not? - Confucius;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_45;Watch the fires burning from across the river. - Tan Daoji;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_46;Kill with a borrowed knife. - Tan Daoji;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_47;If all else fails
column2: retreat. - Tan Daoji;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_48;Human nature is evil
column2: and good is only achieved by force of will. - Xunzi;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_49;Cao Cao may have his Zhang Liao
column2: but I can match him with my friend Gan Ning. - Sun Quan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_50;If I had a son like Sun Ce
column2: I should die without regret. - Yuan Shu;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_51;It is said that northerners are born riders and southerners born sailors. I see it must be true. - Liu Bei;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
LOADING_TIP_52;What are you waiting for? If I
column2: a leader of rank

column1: LOADING_TIP_53;Do not grieve
column2: for so long as I live
column3: Wei will not conquer Shu. - Jiang Wei;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: LOADING_TIP_54;Cao Cao's million man host was turned back with fire
column2: wind

column1: LOADING_TIP_55;Enjoy the Three Kingdoms. - Tan Zhihan;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
